H3.text: Who did Claus von Stauffenberg plot to kill. Hitlar

A4.text: Stauffenberg's assassination attempt on 20 July 1944 was directed at Adolf Hitler.

A5.text: The explosive Stauffenberg placed during the attempt only dealt Hitler minor injuries.
